fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Send someone to the void.
- Send a Zage member to the void. The amount of uses is 1 plus 0.5 (rounded up) per member.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Sending a non-Zage to the void will send them into a subgame. They are removed from the current game.
- Sending a Zage member to the void does the same thing, but they return the next day.
